definition[0]: not in a good physical condition
example[0]: She never gets any exercise â€“ she must be really unfit.
definition[1]: not good enough to do something or to be used for a particular purpose
example[1]: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption (=not suitable to eat).
example[2]: The house was unfit for human habitation (=not good enough to live in).
example[3]: Jenkins is unfit for public office.
example[4]: Hubbard was declared mentally unfit to stand trial.
